name: My swamp!
description:
In this game, you need to collect onions, but every onion you take, new shrek growns up.

A parody to SwampSim

  • Movement: WASD
  • Run: SHIFT

Plugins:

  • UniversalSky (https://github.com/7leodev/UniversalSky)
  • LOD's (https://github.com/godot-extended-libraries/godot-lod)
